title: The Bingity-Bangity School Bus
description: Busby the school bus might be old and clankety, but the children adore him. The adults, however, think heâ€™s ready for the junkyard. Busby decides to run away, and soon finds himself upside down in a field! Thankfully, the children come to the rescue and convince the townspeople to give him a spiffy upgrade. Busby has never looked better!
author: Fleur Conkling
